website_summaries.verdict: A quality donut pillow designed for individuals dealing with hemorrhoid and other pain in the rear.
pros: Memory foam and gel construction provides superior comfort and support around the tailbone than traditional donut pillows
cons: Dual sided design may be uncomfortable to some users wanting a more cushy pillow

customer_reviews.title: such a relief
customer_reviews.text: I broke my coccyx (tailbone) and quickly realized I couldn't sit for more than a couple of minutes. A friend recommended a doughnut cushion. Went on Amazon and there were many to choose from. Fortunately, I chose this one. I just came back from playing bridge for three hours and took my cushion along. I was really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Compared and Proved
customer_reviews.text: I bought both sizes to see the difference, and personally I stay with the Large size, cuz cover all my back including part of my back thighs. The pillow really works and feels great. High recommend
customer_reviews.author: IsiJ

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is exactly what my sore bottom needed. Just the right amount of firmness. April 13, 2018. I returned this item. For the first week it was awesome. But then it started to feel extremely uncomfortable. Full disclosure, I had surgery on my hiney and it did help for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: R.T.B.N.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a welcome home gift for a friend who had been in the hospital too long. She loves it and uses it daily. Her only comment is that it is very firm, but states that it gives her enormous relief from her pressure injuries. I am truly thankful that this ended up to be an excellent purchase and helps her.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchie

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I had a very sore tailbone caused by sitting too long while recouping from an operation and bought this cushion to relieve the pressure. It worked just fine and now it use it frequently when sitting to watch TV and I no longer have a problem. I recommend it for anyone who has a similar problem.
customer_reviews.author: Frank in Dallas, TX

customer_reviews.title: Relief!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for my husband who uses a wheelchair and has to sit all day. He uses it in the car as well and finds it much more comfortable than any of the pad cushions he has tried to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra A Chattan

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant woman was more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a pregnant friend and she said it saved her life... she obviously was exaggerating, but apparently it made her more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BurghMo

customer_reviews.title: Not a cushion for any real medical purpose
customer_reviews.text: This cushion might make a crappy office share slightly more comfortable, but it's pretty much worthless for anything else. I don't know why all of the reviews are saying that it's "too hard", because the one I received can be squeezed completely flat with very little effort. Its size is entirely for show and offers zero actual support where it's needed. The price and quality of the foam makes this thing almost feel like a scam. I give this thing 2 stars because at the very least, the outer shell material seems nice and durable. Everything else is a complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Memory Foam - Very Hard
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with torn inner seam. Also not as as advertised. Product is normal, very firm foam. So hard it cuts of circulation in the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Candid Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a stroke last year after which he developed a bed sore on his butt. The resulting scar tissue makes it very uncomfortable for him to sit in his wheelchair for long periods of time. We tried other cushions but they did not provide relief. I ordered this in XL and it provided immediate pain relief, he is now able to sit comfortably for a couple of before getting antsy and we can actually make it out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Christopher

customer_reviews.title: My New Best Friend!
customer_reviews.text: I have just received the product and it is VERY comforting. To be 100% honest, there is still some "burning" at the site, but all of the severe pain from sitting is gone. I believe this cushion is going to make my healing much more pleasant. This is admittedly my initial opinion but I will edit this post if my opinion changes in any way. I have the large size as I am right at 200 lbs which is the limit for the smaller one. The large size is not at all "big" and easily fits any chair. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Carmony

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion, it is firm!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it so all I have to say is that my hemorrhoid problem feels a little relief from not seating directly on the hot seat of my car so that’s a plus, beware this is really firm, this is not like other cushions that after a while you don’t feel is there, this you will feel is there and I like that because I feel the support it provides, also if you are on the heavy side like me make sure is located on your butt because if it is too low, you will feel your legs getting numb, so use it, enjoy it and feel better
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Good Pick
customer_reviews.text: Nice product if 80% of your time you are spending in office. Worked perfect with my chair and it seems like its gonna work with all type of chairs. My only recommendation is to take large pillow for any size any weight.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to use at the office. It's perfect to keep him comfy as he had an infected cyst on his buttocks which was excised by his doctor and now healing perfectly. Delivery was fast and packed securely.
customer_reviews.author: ny gal

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and back-saving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during the pandemic because I was teaching from home. I have a flat, hard bench which my back and butt after sitting all day. It doesn’t shift, is comfortable, and is lightweight. I bought one for my husband who was working from home, too. His fits on his office chair. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Gulch

customer_reviews.title: Would be more satisfied if there were a larger size available
customer_reviews.text: A little too firm for my issues (prostatitis) and could have been larger so as not to have to perch on it instead of spread out more under you. Would be more satisfied if there were a larger size available.
customer_reviews.author: Alekona

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, relieves pain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother, she has stage 3 rectal cancer and luckily it has helped out quite a bit. Relieves pressure and is actually able to sit, before she basically had to either stand or lay down. She says it could be a bit more cushioned but overall it's great and she's happy to have it
customer_reviews.author: Roger G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for tailbone pain from bulged and slipped disks. I got a blow up seat cushion also. This one works the best! Comfortable, fits perfect in office chair. Helps me get through the day without constantly moving in my chair to get comfortable. Also works great as a *passenger in a car. Is not good for driver seat, puts you too high on the seat. Also, gave good relief on airplane seat. If you're looking for tailbone pain relief, this will help!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have already returned this pillow to Amazon as it was too uncomfortable when compared to the oval donut I was trying to improve upon.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Sheyer

customer_reviews.title: No pain!
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in a long time I can sit at my desk and not feel soreness. I used to smoke so I was up and out of my chair every 2 hours but now I kind of just stay put and my bum gets really sore but as soon as I sat on this oval donut the pressure and discomfort was gone, 11/10 I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jinx7997

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister who was recovering from painful cancer radiation. She couldn’t sit up because of the pain and she was miserable. I bought this to see if it would help and it was AMAZING! My sister literally took it everywhere with her - radiation, chemo, the living room - and sent me pictures of herself hugging it. A huge help for such a small price!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne B

customer_reviews.title: Bonmedico Firm Orthopedic Hemorrhoid Pillow, Memory Foam Gel Donut Cushion
customer_reviews.text: This is one review for two of these that I purchased... These pillows are THE BEST in treating irritation to the Coccyx Bone at the base of the spine.
customer_reviews.author: Nasty Jack Nasty

customer_reviews.title: More Firm than Comfy
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is pretty cool although it is not ideal for my issue. I am having a sciatic nerve problem and the firmness of this pillow makes my leg hurt which is the problem I was trying to solve.
customer_reviews.author: Regina McClendon

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband who has had issues with hemorrhoids and has to sit for long hours at a desk. This pillow has helped tremendously...highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: preacherswife82

customer_reviews.title: Hubby Loves It
customer_reviews.text: We bought one that just smashed like a pancake. I got this for hubby and he really likes it and it holds up well. It rather thick and that’s why it works. He likes the hole in the middle and the size works for him.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Katopolous

customer_reviews.title: Relieved both my hemmroids and tail bone pain
customer_reviews.text: Was sitting at my desk fir 12plus hour days working. It was killing my tailbone and caused hemmeroids! This was a lifesaver!! Hemmerpids were gone within a week and back ain decreased signoficantly!
customer_reviews.author: Therese B

customer_reviews.title: I suffer from hemorrhoids
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from hemorrhoids that come every so often and I've been looking for a cushion to alleviate pain. This works phenomenally, after I apply cream and use this to sit during work, there is virtually no pain. Even when the hemorrhoids are not inflamed, it's very comfortable to sit on and helps keep my posture straight
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, large size very small for a 123 pound little old lad
customer_reviews.text: Ordered large, my Momis 123 pounds and just fits. It is hard and the stiffness hurts her. Wish I could return it. A lot of money for not so good product. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

customer_reviews.title: It's great and I'm ordering a 2nd one for my scooter ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfy and very effective. I've had both hips replaced and my Coccyx bone keeps me in agonizing pain but this cushion has really helped. It's firm, which it needs to be, but not too much. It's great and I'm ordering a 2nd one for my scooter seat & car.
customer_reviews.author: deborah c.

customer_reviews.title: It’s better than nothing...
customer_reviews.text: It feels smaller than it look, and it’s pretty hard and not terribly comfortable but it is useful for short periods of time. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: ksab

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Works perfect for hemmy probs
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the relief I needed. Appears to be very durable and even after a few months of daily use its shown no sign of wear nor distress. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help remediate my issue with pressure soars. I am 6ft 235 lbs and found this product to be very well made and very comfortable. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: larry r heverly

customer_reviews.title: If you have this problem, you need this item.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding item, does exactly what it says it does, I would buy this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow I just had surgery and sitting on this pillow helps to relief the pain in my back, hips and legs. I need to get one for my car. A week later I order 2 more cushions for work and my car.
customer_reviews.author: VHenry

customer_reviews.title: I had this product for 2 weeks. So far ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for 2 weeks. So far is doing its job, I'm able to get off my work chair im an instant. I dont even think about getting off the chair. I gave it four stars bc I have to reposition myself to the cushion to avoid the pain, I think it has to do with me having a big bum. Im not a big person but do have a wide hips. Maybe they need an XXL, LOL.
customer_reviews.author: monzalez95

customer_reviews.title: Too hard
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was gonna help but because it's hard, it hurts after sitting on it for a while. I'm hoping to return the item before it's too late and maybe get something else.
customer_reviews.author: PetersonFam

customer_reviews.title: Very good pillow 250+ 6'4" with large frame
customer_reviews.text: Very good pillow 250+ 6'4" with large frame, isn't made or perfect shape wise for someone my size but far from uncomfortable and supports my weight as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Hello /g/

customer_reviews.title: donut pillow
customer_reviews.text: It is comfy and it is making my butt feel better but I have only had it two days and I think it will lose it's shape in a short amount of time but for the money, not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Goff

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and Thankful!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful! I took a hard fall hitting my pelvic ring bone. Thankfully nothing broken yet angry muscles and more. This made all the difference in being able to sit to drive and more. Without it I would be in pain for two days after a 20 minute drive to town and back each way. So thank you for making this😁
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I have sciatica pain and at times it is severe. This seat has helped me so very much. I carry it with me everywhere I go and sit on it as much as possible. Wonderful invention. Thanks to Bonmedico.
customer_reviews.author: Constance A. Tague

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Second purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because my husband has been have pressure sores for months. He has tried sitting on pillows and other cushions to no avail. From the moment we received this he has been sitting pain free and for the first time in months able to sit and watch television comfortably. I anticipate ordering one of these for myself in the near future. Well my wife just ordered another one for her stationary bike after trying mine on hers.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID MINOR

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I returned the donut, it was hard, and for me it was to hard to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Forgacs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and carry.
customer_reviews.text: I just had surgery. I was unable to sit due to the pain. It helped me to support my body. It has a bag. It gives you a cooling effect. Since I can not carry heavy equipment, it is light and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Urban

customer_reviews.title: NO BETTER
customer_reviews.text: NO BETTER THAN THE 15 OTHERS I WASTED MONEY ON , DON'T BUY , JUST A LOST CAUSE.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.Better than other cushionsWill have to buy another one,so I can stop carrying this one to different rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Zalik

customer_reviews.title: Better than others I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many other seat cushions, and this cushion has relieved more of my pressure pain than a more expensive cushion I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Claudine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Had surgery. Relief! This was one of two butt pillows ordered. This one has support keeping me from touching but also still soft. Got the large size and it's not really large at all.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Weaver

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised by this pillow. I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this pillow. I didn't have much hopes for it, but so far it has alleviated much pain and discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: jodylync

customer_reviews.title: No more pain while sitting.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 78 year old big lady. I sit a lot, watch tv and read. I have tried several cushions to make sitting more comfortable. This one works, no more tailbone pain. Will order again. Recommend for anybody with sitting issues.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Schellenberg

customer_reviews.title: Best Hemorrhoid Cushion
customer_reviews.text: I have had hemorrhoids ever since having my children. They come and go, but sometimes they are painful. I have been working from home and sitting more than usual lately, so I ordered this seat cushion. I have had it for a few days and it has been very comfortable. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Prinzo

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Provides significant relief but is also solid and not overly malleable. Perfect balance between comfort and rigidity

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow does cushion my bottom but it also causes a mild back ache after sitting on it for an extended period. I got this to use on a long car drive for vacation. It did help some, therefore my average review.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Works good for about 30 minutes then get so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works good for about 30 minutes then get so comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Life is so much better now!
customer_reviews.text: My Bonmedico Firm Orthopedic Hemorrhoid Pillow has given me incredible relief. I use public transportation a lot ant it was becoming so painful to sit on hard seats hat I was curtailing my travel. That is just a memory now because my "donut" has taken all the pain from sitting away. Thank you Bonmedico!!

customer_reviews.title: The color of this pillow is black, not two toned.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Amazing comfort! So glad I bought the large, because it gives extra room to get comfortable! Love this Pillow for sitting! Rachel

customer_reviews.text: Much to firm to be even close to comfortable. Item retuned. I would not recommend this item to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: ☝🏼👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: One of the best my client and I have found!!!!

customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, came in its own carrying bag for discreet use outside the home, firm but flexible, high quality removable and washable cover. Extremely satisfied and would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AML

customer_reviews.title: 275 pound comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is firm enough for my 275lb body. Doesn't smash flat when I sit on it for hours, has a good bounce back after holding me for hours. I'm ordering another to use in my boat, for long days fishing.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom it helped with her bed sores.

customer_reviews.title: Allowed me to sit comfortably.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, large donut hole needed. I hope it holds its cushion size for a long period. Too early to tell.

customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research on the best online and amazon products available for the issue causing my need for this product. This product does is comfortable at first, however, it did not rectify my particular problem completely. I sit for long hours at a desk which cause bum and back aches. This cushion does work for the first few hours but then I need to remove for a different sitting position. I also purchase the (amazon) ComfiLife Coccyx Orthopedic Memory Foam cushion. Both helped equally for me but my daughter who home-schools (13 years old) and sits for long periods as well, says the ComfiLife helps. Definitely worth trying for the price.

customer_reviews.text: My 77 yr old father is having surgery and this pillow is great now for discomfort and will be great for healing w/out pressure after surgery
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

product_meta.title: bonmedico Firm Orthopedic Donut Pillow - Home Office Memory Foam Hemorrhoid Pillow or Donut Cushion for Hemorrhoid Treatment & Coccyx Pain Relief, BBL Pillow for Home, Office, Car & Wheelchair, Large
feature_bullets: ✔ FIRM PAIN RELIEVING: This donut cushion helps to relieve pain in the spine and buttocks by shifting the tailbone when sitting and reducing pressure on the pelvis. With its orthopedic firmness the orthopedic seat cushion offers exceptional lumbar support for the treatment of hemorrhoids, coccyx injury, sciatica and pressure sores.

✔ HIGH-TECH: The donut sitting pillow for office chair is an innovative gel / memory foam hybrid. Its ergonomic design features a contoured compact viscoelastic memory foam core with a cooling gel layer on top. Due to the compacted foam mixture and the recess in the centre, the painful area is prevented from touching the seat.

✔ COMFORTABLE EVEN AFTER SURGERY: The gel and memory foam butt pillow offers an ideal mixture of maximum sitting comfort and orthopedic firmness. The underside doughnut cushion is made of a non-slip material that ensures the ergonomic seat cushion pad stays in place and will not shift or slide on any surface and can also be used as bbl pillow after surgery.

✔ VERSATILE: The medical donut can be used anywhere: It is suitable as an ergonomic chair cushion at home, home office, computer chair cushion, office chair cushion, car seat cushion or wheelchair cushion. The orthopedic donut cushion is perfect for women and men and offers high seat comfort. It can also be used as a coccyx cushion when travelling by train or plane.

✔ HYGIENIC AND SIZE: The donut shaped pillow comes with a cover that is machine washable at 86°F. This makes the donut tailbone cushion very convenient. All materials used for our donut pillow for hemorrhoids are non-toxic. The hemmoroid treatment pillow in standard size measures 18.1x13x3.15 in and is recommended for a weight up to 297 lbs.
